description: Run and debug JUnit or TestNG test cases.
configuration.java.test.defaultConfig.de: Specify the name of the default test configuration.
configuration.java.test.config.descripti: Specify the configurations for running the tests.
configuration.java.test.config.item.desc: Specify the configuration item for running the tests.
configuration.java.test.config.name.desc: Specify the name of the configuration item.
configuration.java.test.config.workingDi: Specify the working directory when running the tests.
configuration.java.test.config.classPath: The classpaths defined in this setting will be appended to the resolved classpaths.
Automatically resolve the classpaths of current project.
The classpaths within 'runtime' scope of current project.
The classpaths within 'test' scope of current project.
The path after '!' will be excluded from the classpaths.
configuration.java.test.config.modulePat: The modulepaths defined in this setting will be appended to the resolved modulepaths.
Automatically resolve the modulepaths of current project.
The modulepaths within 'runtime' scope of current project.
The modulepaths within 'test' scope of current project.
The path after '!' will be excluded from the modulePaths.
configuration.java.test.config.vmArgs.de: Specify the extra options and system properties for the JVM.
configuration.java.test.config.args.desc: Specify the command line arguments which will be passed to the test runner.
configuration.java.test.config.env.descr: Specify the extra environment variables when running the tests.
configuration.java.test.config.envFile.d: Specify the absolute path to a file containing environment variable definitions.
configuration.java.test.config.sourcePat: Specify extra source paths when debugging the tests.
configuration.java.test.config.preLaunch: Specify the label of a task specified in tasks.json (in the workspace's .vscode folder). The task will be launched before the start of testing.
configuration.java.test.config.postDebug: Specify the label of a task specified in tasks.json (in the workspace's .vscode folder). The task will be launched at the very end of testing.
Specify the targeting test framework for this test configuration. Supported values are `junit`, `testng`.
configuration.java.test.config.filters.t:
Specify the tags to be included or excluded. 

Tags having `!` as the prefix will be **excluded**. 

Note: This setting **only** takes effect when `testKind` is set to `junit`.
contributes.viewsWelcome.inLightWeightMo:
No test cases are listed because the Java Language Server is currently running in [LightWeight Mode](https://aka.ms/vscode-java-lightweight). To show test cases, click on the button to switch to Standard Mode.
[Switch to Standard Mode](command:java.server.mode.switch?%5B%22Standard%22,true%5D)
contributes.viewsWelcome.enableTests:
Click below button to configure a test framework for your project.
[Enable Java Tests](command:_java.test.enableTests)
